name: spoon-awesome-skill (XSpoonAi)
description: [项目级] A curated collection of Claude Code skills for SpoonOS development and Web3 integrations. 57 Python scripts across 19 skills: SpoonOS Skills for Vibe Coding (build agents) + Web3 Skills for Skill Agent Integrations (DeFi, NFT, DAO, Security).。来源: https://github.com/XSpoonAi/spoon-awesome-skill

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A curated collection of Claude Code skills for SpoonOS development and Web3 integrations. 57 Python scripts across 19 skills: SpoonOS Skills for Vibe Coding (build agents) + Web3 Skills for Skill Agent Integrations (DeFi, NFT, DAO, Security).

来源: https://github.com/XSpoonAi/spoon-awesome-skill
语言: Python
Stars: 12

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:

platform-challenge

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
Use `SpoonReactSkill` to build agents that automatically load and use Web3 skills:

```python
from spoon_ai.agents import SpoonReactSkill
from spoon_ai.chat import ChatBot
